ace-playbook-documentation.description: Documentation patterns for ACE (Agentic Context Engineering) playbook system using spec-kit format

spec-kit-format.description: Structured documentation format with spec.md, plan.md, and insights.md files

markdown-technical-writing.description: Markdown documentation with emoji section headers and structured formatting

documentation-architecture.description: Multi-file documentation pattern with separation of concerns (specification, approach, analysis)

automated-knowledge-management.description: System for automatically detecting, validating, curating, and evolving coding patterns

version-controlled-learning.description: Git-based version control for learned patterns and evolving documentation

separation-of-documentation-concerns.description: Separate pattern definition (spec), implementation approach (plan), and analytical insights into distinct files

human-readable-automation.description: Generate documentation that is both machine-processable and human-friendly with clear structure and formatting

confidence-based-curation.description: Use confidence thresholds (e.g., â‰¥70%) to filter and promote high-quality patterns to core documentation

evidence-driven-learning.description: Base pattern discovery on actual code observations, test results, and execution feedback rather than assumptions

metadata.discovery_method: bottom-up from file structure and markdown content analysis
